dcterms:description: A unique synthetic vehicle keypoint dataset generated using the CARLA simulator from a roadside perspective. This comprehensive dataset includes generated images with bounding boxes, tracking IDs, and 33 keypoints for each vehicle, spanning over 25k images across 28 scenes, containing over 150k vehicle instances and 4.9 million keypoints.
dcterms:title: SKoPe3D

dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: An open-source simulator designed for research in autonomous driving, providing a platform for generating realistic traffic scenarios.
dcterms:title: CARLA
